name: Nutrichef Food Dehydrator Machine | Dehydrates Beef Jerky, Meat, Food, Fruit, Vegetables & Dog Treats | Great For At Home Use | High-Heat Circulation for Even Dehydration | 5 Easy to Clean Trays
about_this_item: EFFICIENT DEHYDRATION: A multi-tier electric food dehydrator can quickly and efficiently remove moisture from fruits, vegetables, meat, beef jerky and other foods, preserving their flavor, nutrients, and texture for longer storage times.
EASY ACCESS AND OPERATION: Built with easy to use one operational button. Dehydrate with just a click. It has a temperature control system with a maximum of 180Â°F.

HEALTHY SNACKS: Dehydrated foods are a healthy snack option, as they are free from additives, preservatives, and excess sugar and salt. They can also be a good source of vitamins, minerals, and fiber, making them a great addition to any diet.

PRESERVE FOOD: Drying your own fruits, vegetables, and meats can be a cost-effective way to preserve food and reduce waste. retain nutrients and flavor, store for extended periods without refrigeration, and enjoy a cost-effective, educational activity with friends and family

HEAT CIRCULATION: Through scientific testing, our food dehydrator has been shown to increase the shelf life of food by utilizing high heat circulation that travels evenly through each tray. This process effectively removes moisture content, resulting in shrunken but nutrient-dense food that retains 97% of its original vitamins and minerals.

title: Works fine! Dry food and Herbs.
content: I had a dehydrator which I used for desiccant and filament to support 3D printing. Then, wanting to dry out some freshly harvested herbs, I recalled the desiccants are carcinogenic, so I got a clean unit (this one) for food-safe work.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023

title: Verified Purchase
content: The temperature is nice, and can go very low. This is important for some items. There's a ton of space, and I often use it to reconstitute stale potato chips and the like. There's no safety timer, so you can just run it how you want without having to work around when the device feels it is ok for you to use it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2021

title: Clicks constantly, but is reliable and effective!

title: Works very well

title: Verified Purchase
content: The noise level is low. It emits a soft hum that's not at all distracting or too loud. Ours, however, makes a constant clicking sound every 10-15 seconds. Originally, we were concerned and thought we had a defective piece, and maybe we do, but it doesn't have any effect on its functionality. We noticed it was coming from the on/off area, and didn't stop or change when temperature was raised or lowered, or time extended. We spoke with the manufacturer and they stated that this should eventually go away, but it never has. Nonetheless, it doesn't seem to cause any issues, but we wanted to point it out that it does do this, when most others don't.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2024

title: Very good introductory dehydrator
content: We don't have any complaints, though. It does a good job at doing what it was built to do!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I use it to preserve food that is about to go bad. It works well.

title: Very good
content: Bought this thinking "oh well it's $50 if it doesn't work...". Turned out I am very happy with it. This works great especially for the price. My mother has a $300 pro dehydrator, and this is not that. This guy is small. You will get about 3 apples sliced thin in here, not using the bottom shelf (there's some debate on using the bottom shelf). That will shrink to fill a standard size sandwich ziplock bag. Some have complained about the noise. I am not bothered by it. It's low, and steady. If I was in a small apartment, or if placed close to a bedroom maybe it would be an issue for me. Easy to clean and setup. My 5 year old loves helping, and it's very easy for him to use as well. Also the instructions are very, very helpful. Not just about the machine, but techniques and tips for dehydrating.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2022

title: Verified Purchase
content: I got this for my hubby . He loves this. Very easy to use, not taking alot space on counter. Thank you
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023

title: The best
content: I am so happy I got this dehydrator.  I use it to make jerky treats for my Standard Poodle.  My poodle is a very picky eater and I have not been able to get the only treats she is crazy about for a while. She has been miserable!  Nothing I got was acceptable.  I have now made chicken jerky treats 3 different times and she loves them.  For anyone interested, I slice 3 lbs chicken breasts into thin narrow slices, add a pinch of salt.  I lay the pieces as flat at I can on the trays, close but not touching. Run the NutriChef for 7-8 hours on Max speed, switching the trays around after several hours.  I certainly recommend the NutriChef dehydrator for this purpose.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: I have a small herb garden and also like to dry a few fresh fruits from time to time- apples and bananas usually.  This dehydrator is small and only has 5 trays but they hold a lot!  I was able to dry four medium sized, thinly sliced potatoes at one time.  Dried, they filled a quart jar.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2019

title: Great for making jerky
content: The operation is very quiet - could barely hear it.  The only down side is knowing where the temp is. Low, medium, high is not accurate enough for me so its a guess on the temperature level so I have to use my digital thermometer to get it right.  If that's not an issue for you, this machine is excellent!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 20, 2020

title: Verified Purchase
content: The plastic trays have little tabs that fit into the trays above and below to make the whole thing fit together. One tray had a missing tab when I unpacked the box. I emailed the company and they had me take a photo of it and email it to them, and then they promptly sent me another tray. Unbelievably, that tray too had a broken tab. They were so nice, didn't even need a picture this time, just sent me another tray. All of this took about a week. After I finally got working trays, I love this little machine. (To be honest, I used it with the other 4 trays while I was waiting for the one unbroken one.) It's not a giant dehydrator, but for my home garden, it's perfect. I dried tomatoes, pears, apples, peppers, onions, and beans for shelling. They all came out perfectly. I've got big plans for next year...And I'm grateful that the seller was so prompt with what could have been a less-than-satisfactory situation.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024

title: Just what I was needing for the small amount of dehydrating that I do
content: I only gave this a 4 star for one reason: when I received the unit and removed it from the box and piece of hard plastic fell out of package.  In inspecting the unit the very bottom tray had a plastic part that is for the adjusting height of the tray.  I was going to ask Amazon if I could get just a replacement tray but it would only let me return the whole unit.  I did not want to do this because I was ready to make jerky.  Iâm in hope that NutriChef May see this review and get in touch with me about a replacing the tray.  Other than this the unit is so far fantastic and easy to use and clean.  The clip had to be broken upon packing as it was on the very bottom tray.  Thank you for a great product all in all.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023

title: Fantastic product without paying the "mercedes benz" price!!
content: I didnt understand the instructions comoletely before I tried it. However, upon figuring some things out on my own, i have used the machine almost every day since it arrived. I wanted to try it out on a few things before I gave my review. I did strawberries, blueberries, pineapple, mixed veggies (frzn), Stringbeans(frzn), and apples. All came out woderfully. I am very impressed. I will say, if you purchase the silicone rack covers that dont have the hole already cut out, make sure you make the hole large enough. I was wondering why the food wouldnt dry, and the 1st. Batch took me 24hrs. But it wasn't the fault of the machine. I cut the holes bigger in the liners, and it works perfect. Also, it works even better for larger items like apple slices, without the liners. Im so glad I didnt psy twice or three times as much, to get the same tesults. I may purchase another. Thanks for a great, and yet inexpensive product. Love it!!!!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020

content: Love this dehydrator so much that this is my 2nd purchase. Bought the first one about 3 years ago, still going strong. Just needed a second to keep up with all the fruits i dry. I'm gonna get a 3rd soon!

content: Just opened and getting ready to dehydrate. I had an old circular one that I got from a thrift shop before, and didn't bring it when I moved. title: Verified Purchase
content: This is a replacement for my 30 yr old dehydrator that finally gave up the ghost.  I love the fact that it dehydrates quickly ( a relative term as it dries herbs in a few hours and beef for jerkey in a day and a half - it works as well as any table top cheap dehydrator.  Seems to be sturdy, fan noise in minimal, doesn't use a ton of electricity, BUT it's beyond me how to get the drying trays to seat properly.  Oh well, it still works well and the cost is attractive.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2018

title: Fantastic and easy to use!
content: I purchased this dehydrator after carefully reviewing the reviews of other consumers.  The product arrived one day late which was slightly problematic as I bought the meat I was going to dehydrate based on the given delivery date, so I suggest buying your meat after product arrives.  Too, the roast was on sale and the butcher sliced it thin at no charge.  The machine is so easy to use.  Season your jerky, lay strips on racks, cover and press on.  8 hours later I had perfect beef jerky at a tenth of the cost of buying it.  Too, we're on a paleo diet so I was able to make paleo jerky (no soy sauce or sugar added).  Paleo jerky is twice as costly as regular jerky so we saved even more.  If you're worried about the durability of your dehydrator, I suggest buying the 4 year protection plan just in case.  The plan is super cheap.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2020

content: This an awesome product!! I would recommend to anyone.
